testcase.name: try to login to github
testcase.system-out: * configure driver = { type: 'chrome', headless: true} .................... passed Given driver 'https://github.com/login' ................................... passed And input('#login_field', 'dummy') ........................................ passed And input('#password', 'world') ........................................... passed When submit().click("input[name=commit]") ................................. passed Then match html('#js-flash-container') contains 'Incorrect username or password.' . passed Given driver 'https://google.com' ......................................... passed And input("input[name=q]", 'karate dsl') .................................. passed When submit().click("input[name=btnI]") ................................... passed Then waitForUrl('https://github.com/intuit/karate') ....................... passed
